---
title: "Best Achieved Results"

execute: 
    echo: false
format: html
resources:
    - style.css
---

```{r}
library(DT)
data <- read.csv("../best.csv")
datatable(data, 
    rownames = FALSE,
    caption = "Best Achieved Results",
    options = list(
        dom = "t",
        paging = FALSE,
        pageLength = length(unique(data$instance))
    )
)
```
